---
title: "Proportional Volume Distributions by Region (Right Hemisphere)"
author: "Anna MacFarlane and Jasmine King"
date: "3/2/2021"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
new <- read.csv("propGeno4Right.csv")
corrRight <- read.csv("corrRight.csv")

new <- new %>% 
  filter(! is.na(Genotype)) %>% 
  filter(Genotype != "") %>% 
  filter(Genotype != "HN") %>% 
  mutate(geno = case_when(
    Genotype == "APOE2" | Genotype == "APOE22" ~ "APOE2",
    Genotype == "APOE3" | Genotype == "APOE33" ~ "APOE3",
    Genotype == "APOE4" | Genotype == "APOE44" ~ "APOE4",
    Genotype == "CVN" ~ "CVN"
  )) %>% 
  group_by(geno) 

view(new)
```

## Adjusted p-values for multiple comparisons
```{r corrections, echo = FALSE}
p.adjust(corrRight$pval, method = "fdr", n = 163)
```
## Right Hemisphere Regions

```{r Iped, echo = FALSE}
ggplot(data = new, aes(factor(geno), Iped)) +
  geom_violin() +
  geom_boxplot(width = 0.1, outlier.color = "red") +
  geom_jitter(height = 0, width = 0.3, aes(color = Sex)) +
  labs(x = "Genotype",
   	y = "",
   	title = "Interpeduncular Nucleus",
   	subtitle = "Red points denoting outliers")
 
res.aov <- aov(Iped ~ geno, data = new)
summary(res.aov)
```
